Special Interests: Studying books and participating in political debates

Member, Business Advisory Committee
Member, General Purposes Committee

2004

2004-2009

Member, Consultative Committee, Ministry of Rural Development

1 May 2008

26 Jun. 2009

29 Jun. 2009
